entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 13 April 2023
